ValidationRule.description: Block the edition of G4/G5 Bypass Condition for a Fast Track Opportunity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, TEXT(Opportunity__r.Business_Type__c )='Fast Track Opportunity', ISCHANGED(LOA_Bypass__c), NOT(OR( ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c , 'PTA (PROJECT TARGET AGREEMENT) HANDOVER TO DELIVERY/OPERATIONS'), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c , 'In Execution') )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: G4/G5 Bypass Offer Condition cannot be changed with Fast Track Opportunity
